divs: Sighting DetailsI was coming back from the beach with a friend, sitting on the passenger side. Before arriving in my town I saw on the right a huge triangular object which was stationed a few feet high, suddenly disappears followed by the flashes and disappears and reappears later again always followed by flashes of intense white light. I was a pa horrified by what I saw and it was my first experience.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Caltanissetta
This sighting has never been favorited.
